Class tripleplay.ui.Icons

Added Methods
Icon offset(Icon, float, float) Creates an icon that nests and offsets the given icon by the given translation.
Icon scaled(Icon, float) Creates an icon that applies the given scale to the given icon.
Icon solid(int, float) Creates a solid square icon of the given size.
